conbody.p: In Eucalyptus 3.2, the User Console must be manually configured to match the vmtypes configuration of your cloud. This is only necessary if you have customized the vmtypes values in your cloud. If you are using the default values in your cloud, then the default values in the User Console will match.
conbody.note: Automatic configuration is planned for the Eucalyptus 3.3 release.
conbody.p: The vmtypes values are configured in [instance_type] section of the /etc/eucalyptus-console/console.ini file.
The default values are shown below:
How to change the vmtypes in your cloud is covered in another training lesson.
